item.description:
Let's enjoy the great weather for as long as we can by having a picnic/BBQ on Labor Day!!!

One of our meetup group members has recommended the following location for a picnic:

http://www.paddlebost...


We'll meet near:

Charles River Canoe & Kayak
1071 Soldier's Field Road in Allston/Brighton

Please see above website for directions.

I will email members who RSVP yes as to what they should bring (food/drink) to the picnic.
item.name: Labor Day Potluck Picnic/BBQ
